element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm alters the position of points in a layer, displacing them. Points are displaced in a random direction, and the displacement distance follows a normal distribution.

element.name: STDDEV
element.text: The standard deviation of the displacement distance.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting layer with displaced points. The attributes table is the same as the one from the input layer.
